name: Vapour Geek
description:
Vapour Geek is a Cyberpunk music game prototype, in which a vaporwave geek hacks into passersby to follow them in a retro-futuristic world.

Players hack into vehicles by shooting corresponding codes. Every vehicle represents a music hit point procedurally generated at runtime according to the audio spectrum and difficulty (any soundtrack should work in this game).

Control

Aim and shoot key combos on according to the pattern on the top of vehicles. Hit vehicles at the middle to get higher scores. Combos can work regardless of their positions and directions (e.g. ASD = WSX).
